H0.text: A tripleâ€‘beam balance is a necessary item in a laboratory for safety purposes.

H1.text: A metric ruler is necessary in a laboratory for safety purposes.

H2.text: A computer monitor is necessary in a laboratory for safety purposes.

H3.text: Fire extinguisher is necessary in a laboratory for safety purposes.

A4.text: Lack of maintenance can lead to an extinguisher not discharging when required, or rupturing when pressurized.

A5.text: Deaths have occurred, even in recent times, from corroded extinguishers exploding.
